query:
SELECT pt.id, pt.customerId, pt.txid, pt.endToEndId, pt.amount, pt.status, pt.paidAt, pt.createdAt, pt.updatedAt
FROM pix_transactions pt
WHERE pt.txid = 'f76786d04e5d44508fd50305c8a062ee'
LIMIT 1;
